transcript:
Customer: kya maine sir aapko chalana hai ek se paanch lakh aap mujhe tarike se dijiye aap mujhe abhi
Customer: aapka ek hi baat hello aapko jo mere ko hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: haan ji
Executive: ji hi good afternoon sir wo calculations aapko bheji thi maine shayad aapne padha hoga abhishek ne bheja hua tha aapko aur aapne terms and condition bola tha wo bhi bheja gaya hai sir aapko
Customer: lekin wo to galat hai aapne 600 din ka 93000 likha hai aur 400 din ka aapne likha hai 10000 ye kaisi ginti hai cheating wali mujhe samajh mein nahi aayi
Executive: dekhiye sir waha pe ek ek cheez isliye maine calculation nikalwa ke bhijwayi hai running cost jo aata hai per day running cost
Customer: main puchhna chahta hu ki agar 600 din ka agar 93000 hota hai to 400 din ka 10000 kaise ho jata hai aisi cheating kahan se sikhi hai wo hame bhi sikha dijiye taki hame bhi samajh mein aa jaye kaise karke logon ke sath thagi kari ja sakti hai
Executive: sir aapko aapne dekha hoga waha pe jo maine terms bheja hua hai jab hum deal karte hai na koi maine aapko ek leman language mein samjhaya tha
Customer: deal karte hai na to mithi baatein banti hai deal karte hai na to mithi baatein karte hai ye sab nahi dikhate nahi nahi tab tab wo dikhate hai aap khud socho
Executive: thoda sir ek cheez batao aap khud socho ek saal jo aata hai wo aata hai 70000 plus GST ka hum teen saal aapko agar aise denge 70000 ke hisab se to 210000 aate hai
Customer: koi bhi free mein nahi de rahe ho koi bhi free mein nahi de rahe ho pehli baat ye batao
Executive: sir teen saal lene pe agar koi ye haan ek baat hai upar chala ke mujhe batana hai ye ye baat hai ki cheating karne ke hisab se aapne jo bhi rules regulation
Customer: cheating kaise hua sir cheating to tab hua na jab hum teen saal ka rate ek ek saal ke hisab se lete sir hum 210000 lene ki jagah humne aap se 112000 liya sir to 1 lakh to humne aise hi kam kar diya to maine to cheating kaise ho gayi sir maine to ek saal ka liya nahi hai
Executive: sir to teen saal ke hisab se aapne paise thodi na diye sir uske hisab se to 210000 hota hai sir 210000 thodi na aapne diye hai
Customer: aap ek kaam karo aap ye sab jahir karo aap online bhi jahir karo
Executive: haan wahi conclusion pe aate hai conclusion pe aate hai sir
Customer: nahi online ye sab jahir karo aur logon ko aisa band kar do kyuki isse log bechare confuse ho jate hai aur
Executive: sir are ye cheez aapke proposal mein likha hai aap terms padhiye waha pe proposal mein ye cheez mention hai
Customer: abhi abhi abhi hum log aisa karte hai aap apne itne 600 mein 600 din thaga hai to abhi 400 500 din aur bhi aur thag lo mujhe chalu kar do mera wo jo hai na service main dekhna chahta hu ki aap kitne had tak giroge last
Executive: aap mujhe final bataiye thoda sir isko chalana hai chalne de
Customer: chalna hi dena padega kyuki aisi thagi ka shikar banenge to negative bhi aayega main deta jaunga aapko bada sa achcha review deta jaunga 400 din mujhe fayda milega review dene mein
Executive: dekhiye thoda sir ye ye jo deal hoti hai na sir obviously koi bhi multi year ki deal hoti hai
Customer: ye aap apne paas rakhye deal apne paas rakhye maine maine teen saal ke liye liya tha maine ek saal ke liye kuch liya hi nahi tha aap bol rahe ho teen saal ke paise aapne nahi liye the aapne do saal ke paise liye teen saal ke liye
Executive: sir hum teen saal ke paise aap se nahi liye the aap suno aap aap aap bata rahe ho wo galat hai kyuki aapko kuch pata hi nahi hai aapke sales person jhoot bol rahe hai ya aap jhoot bol rahe ho do mein se ek
Customer: aap aap aapne teen saal ke paise nahi diye the aapne do saal ke diye humne teen saal ki service di hai
Executive: ye bhi socho sir thoda sa aap aap ye bhi to company ke bare mein bhi to socho na sir agar company kar rahi hai aapke liye to aap ye to bologe na sir
Customer: aap aap mujhe ye batao 600 din ka gina aapne aur 400 din ka aap 10 10000 gin rahe ho ye konsi calculation mein cheating wala ye calculation ban chuka hai kahan pe hai ye aisa calculation
Executive: sir aapko maine ek example diya aapko example diya sir agar hum ek saal 70000 ka bech rahe hai to teen 210000 ka hota hai waise humne aapko jo diya na sir do saal ke paise mein teen saal ki service di hai us pe to aap baat nahi kar rahe ho na sir
Customer: to fir iska matlab ye hua aapke salesman sab cheating kar rahe hai kyuki usne bola
Executive: cheating nahi kar rahe sir ye company ke offers the jo humne aapko diya hai sir
Customer: teen saal usne bola ki bhai teen saal aapki service chalegi iske liye
Executive: sir teen saal to chal hi rahi hai na band kaun kara raha hai teen saal to chal hi rahi hai
Customer: teen saal teen saal kyu nahi hai wapis dene mein teen saal kyu nahi hai dene mein
Executive: wapis dene mein aapne teen saal ke paise thodi na diye thoda sir ye bhi to samjho aap humne aapko ek saal additional diya hai complimentary
Customer: nahi nahi nahi koi bhi aaj ke zamane mein aap dekhiye thoda sir dekhiye jo jo jo log bidi peete hai na wo bhi naam nahi dete free mein to aap kaise denge
Executive: sir free mein dekhiye koi cheez nahi aati hai but hum jab aapko offering mein humne ye diya tha sir ki humne aapko teen saal ki service di do saal ke paise mein ye offering mein tha to humne diya sir aap band kara rahe hai sir fir hum nahi band kar rahe hai sir
Customer: ye do isme do baatein hai ek ek customer ke sath cheating dusra government ke sath dhoka ye do baatein hai
Executive: sir cheating hoti agar cheating hoti na sir to ye terms and condition aapke na likha hota sir
Customer: customer ke sath cheating aur government ko ek saal ka dhoka diya ki hum log free de rahe hai matlab itna itna itna paisa bacha rahe ho to koi baat nahi wo to aap
Executive: aisa nahi bacha rahe sir hum aapka paisa bacha rahe hai humne aapke 210000 ki jagah humne aadhe paise liye aapke sir hamara kuch bacha
Customer: nahi nahi hai hamara to already sab kuch chala gaya hai che mahine to waise bhi loss aisa nahi hai thoda sir wo aap soch rahe ho sir do saal service aap chala liye ho uske baad aap soch rahe ho aisa nahi hai sir aisa nahi hai ki india mart se response nahi milega bilkul milega thoda kam kariye
Executive: abhi abhi abhi 400 450 din baki hai abhi abhi sir isko bataye conclude karte hai aapko refund chahiye ya chalate hai sir isko aage
Customer: agar mera paisa pura milta hai jaise main soch raha hu to mujhe refund chahiye agar aapko cheating karke 10000 hi dena hai to main 450 din jo bhi mere bache hai wo main chalu rakhunga taki mujhe pata chale ke main kitna thaga ja sakta hu aage
Executive: theek hai sir dekhiye calculation maine refund ki bhej di hai aapko
Customer: che mahine to che mahine to aap service nahi de pa rahe aur 450 400 din aap service de payenge ki nahi wo wo khali dekhenge chalo ye ye is bar
Executive: sir positive rahiye thoda sir positive rahiye is pe kam karte hai bilkul aapko response dikhna shuru ho jayega is pe kam karwata hu main team se
Customer: dekhte hai is bar pata pata chalega kitna kam hota hai
Executive: bilkul sir aap pareshan mat hoiye is pe kam karwate hai to abhi main ye deactivation ki request band kar raha hu sir aapko service chalani hai right cancel kar raha hu
Customer: karna hi padega sir ye mere paas 450 mahine hai to main uska positive rahiye positive rahiye sir bilkul is pe kam karwate hai sir
Executive: waise bhi wo paise gir gaye ya kahi aur kho gaye aisa hi samjhenge aur kya karenge fir
Customer: positive rehte hai sir is pe main kam karwata hu response banate hai sir jaise jaise bolunga waise kam karte hai dekhte hai sir response badhega bilkul
Executive: theek hai abhi ke liye thoda sir main abhi ke liye sir main ye refund ki request cancel kar raha hu aur aapka feedback close kar raha hu sir
Customer: maine bilkul bata diya ke meri amount agar mujhe jo sahi amount jo mujhe milni chahiye wo nahi mil rahi hai isliye main chalu karna ke chalu karne ke liye bolunga aur 450 din 450 din aur sahan karunga aapka
Executive: sir main aapko ensure karta hu thoda sir main ensure karta hu ki aapko
Customer: kya hai wo 450 din sir accept karunga 450 din aur bad service accept karunga che mahine already chale gaye aur ye 450 din aur matlab kahi na kahi
Executive: sir main ensure karta hu sir ki main ensure karta hu sir ki aapki service thodi improve hogi is pe hum kam karte hai milke bilkul sir aap positive rahiye is pe kam karwate hai sir
Customer: achcha theek hai theek hai
Executive: chaliye main aapka feedback
summary:
Concerns:

- Discrepancy in calculation for 600 and 400 days.

- Feels cheated due to the pricing structure.

- Wants to know how the calculations are done.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the multi-year deal benefits.

- Executive mentioned the customer got a discounted price.

- Executive canceled the refund request.

- Executive assured improved service and response.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will work with the team to improve service.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, cheating, calculation, service
